name: Toblen Stonehill

personality.mannerisms: Welcoming smile, wipes bar nervously when mentioning Redbrands

background: From Triboar to east. Came to prospect but knew innkeeping better than mining.
role: Innkeeper. Source of rumors and information. Hub of social activity.
rooms: 6 rooms for rent. See PHB for prices.

rumors.garaele: Sister Garaele left town few days, returned wounded/exhausted (Narth, old farmer)
rumors.edermath: Daran Edermath is former adventurer (Elsa, barmaid)
rumors.orcs: Ore raiders on east end of Triboar Trail. Townmaster looking for help (Lanar, miner)
rumors.dendrar: Thel Dendrar murdered by Redbrands tenday ago for standing up to them. Wife and kids missing (Trilena)
rumors.secret_tunnel: Carp Alderleaf found secret tunnel, almost caught by Redbrands (Pip)
rumors.miners_exchange: Redbrands don't hassle Miner's Exchange. Don't want trouble with Halia (Freda, weaver)

redbrand_fear: Tries not to stir up trouble. Fears retaliation against family.
